title: Is there any tips on playing Rakan in his roll of supp?
body:
I just recently got Rakan and I wanted to know is there any tips on playing him in game?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

replies.body: the E REcast doesnt cost anything, so, that, also, when you ult, dont right click as if your auto attacking them cuz that will slow you, just try to walk over them instead
A good start is playing with a Xayah, preferably a duo queue partner.
